00019 /* When appropriate, alloca is cleaner than malloc/free.  The storage
00020  * is freed automatically on return from a function. When using gcc the
00021  * builtin version is much faster. */
00022 #ifdef __GNUC__
00023 # undef alloca
00024 # define alloca(x) __builtin_alloca((x))
00025 #else
00026 /* this is necessary (and sufficient) for Solaris 10: */
00027 # ifdef __sun
00028 #  include <alloca.h>
00029 # endif
00030 #endif

00036 #define AZERO(x, n) {int _I_, _SZ_ = (n); for(_I_ = 0; _I_ < _SZ_; _I_++) (x)[_I_] = 0;}

00187 static R_INLINE double sqr_length(const double *x, int n)
00188 {
00189     double ans = 0;
00190     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) ans += x[i] * x[i];
00191     return ans;
00192 }

00206 static R_INLINE double*
00207 apply_perm(double *dest, const double *src, const int *perm, int n)
00208 {
00209     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) dest[i] = src[perm ? perm[i] : i];
00210     return dest;
00211 }

00225 static R_INLINE double*
00226 apply_iperm(double *dest, const double *src, const int *perm, int n)
00227 {
00228     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) dest[perm ? perm[i] : i] = src[i];
00229     return dest;
00230 }

00240 static R_INLINE int Gp_grp(int ind, int nf, const int *Gp)
00241 {
00242     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) if (ind < Gp[i + 1]) return i;
00243     error(_("invalid row index %d (max is %d)"), ind, Gp[nf]);
00244     return -1;                  /* -Wall */
00245 }

00260 get_sigma(int REML, const int* dims, const double* d)

00282 static int                      /* populate the st, nc and nlev arrays */
00283 ST_nc_nlev(const SEXP ST, const int *Gp, double **st, int *nc, int *nlev)
00284 {
00285     int ans = 0, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00286 
00287     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00288         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00289         int nci = *INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
00290 
00291         if (nci > ans) ans = nci;
00292         if (st) st[i] = REAL(STi);
00293         nc[i] = nci;
00294         nlev[i] = (Gp[i + 1] - Gp[i])/nci;
00295     }
00296     return ans;
00297 }

00308 static void update_ranef(SEXP x)
00309 {
00310     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), i1 = 1;
00311     int nf = dims[nf_POS], p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00312     double *b = RANEF_SLOT(x), *u = U_SLOT(x), one[] = {1,0};
00313     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00314     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00315     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00316     R_CheckStack(); 
00317 
00318     if (!SXWT_SLOT(x)) {        /* unweighted LMM */
00319         double *d = DEV_SLOT(x), *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x), mone[] = {-1,0};
00320         CHM_DN cu = N_AS_CHM_DN(u, q, 1), sol;
00321         R_CheckStack();
00322                                 /* solve RX beta-hat = del2 */
00323         F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, RX_SLOT(x), &p, fixef, &i1);
00324         F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, mone, RZX_SLOT(x), &q,
00325                         fixef, &i1, one, u, &i1);
00326         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, cu, &c)))
00327             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed:"));
00328         Memcpy(u, (double*)(sol->x), q);
00329         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00330         d[usqr_POS] = sqr_length(u, q);
00331         d[wrss_POS] = d[disc_POS] = d[pwrss_POS] - d[usqr_POS];
00332     }
00333     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00334                                 /* inverse permutation */
00335     for (int i = 0; i < q; i++) b[((int*)L->Perm)[i]] = u[i];
00336     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00337         for (int k = 0; k < nc[i]; k++) { /* multiply by \tilde{S}_i */
00338             double dd = st[i][k * (nc[i] + 1)];
00339             int base = Gp[i] + k * nlev[i];
00340             for (int kk = 0; kk < nlev[i]; kk++) b[base + kk] *= dd;
00341         }
00342         if (nc[i] > 1) {        /* multiply by \tilde{T}_i */
00343             F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nlev + i, nc + i, one,
00344                             st[i], nc + i, b + Gp[i], nlev + i);
00345         }
00346     }
00347 }
00348 
00358 SEXP mer_ST_initialize(SEXP ST, SEXP Gpp, SEXP Zt)
00359 {
00360     int *Gp = INTEGER(Gpp),
00361         *Zdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym)),
00362         *zi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_iSym)), nf = LENGTH(ST);
00363     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int),
00364         nnz = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_pSym))[Zdims[1]];
00365     double *rowsqr = Alloca(Zdims[0], double),
00366         **st = Alloca(nf, double*),
00367         *zx = REAL(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_xSym));
00368     R_CheckStack();
00369     
00370     ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00371     AZERO(rowsqr, Zdims[0]);
00372     for (int i = 0; i < nnz; i++) rowsqr[zi[i]] += zx[i] * zx[i];
00373     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00374         AZERO(st[i], nc[i] * nc[i]);
00375         for (int j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++) {
00376             double *stij = st[i] + j * (nc[i] + 1);
00377             for (int k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++)
00378                 *stij += rowsqr[Gp[i] + j * nlev[i] + k];
00379             *stij = sqrt(nlev[i]/(0.375 * *stij));
00380         }
00381     }
00382     return R_NilValue;
00383 }

00393 static double *ST_getPars(SEXP x, double *pars)
00394 {
00395     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00396     int nf = LENGTH(ST), pos = 0;
00397     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00398         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00399         double *st = REAL(STi);
00400         int nci = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol))[0];
00401         int ncp1 = nci + 1;
00402 
00403         for (int j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00404             pars[pos++] = st[j * ncp1];
00405         for (int j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00406             for (int k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00407                 pars[pos++] = st[k + j * nci];
00408     }
00409     return pars;
00410 }

00419 SEXP mer_ST_getPars(SEXP x)
00420 {
00421     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, DIMS_SLOT(x)[np_POS]));
00422     ST_getPars(x, REAL(ans));
00423 
00424     UNPROTECT(1); 
00425     return ans;
00426 }
00427 
00433 static void update_A(SEXP x)
00434 {
00435     CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x), Zt = Zt_SLOT(x);
00436     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *ai = (int*)(A->i), *ap = (int*)(A->p),
00437         *zi = (int*)(Zt->i), *zp = (int*)(Zt->p), ncmax,
00438         nf = DIMS_SLOT(x)[nf_POS];
00439     int annz = ap[A->ncol], znnz = zp[Zt->ncol];
00440     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00441     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*), *ax = (double*)(A->x),
00442         *zx = (double*)(Zt->x), one[] = {1,0};
00443     R_CheckStack();
00444 
00445     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00446 
00447     if (annz == znnz) { /* Copy Z' to A unless A has new nonzeros */
00448         Memcpy(ax, zx, znnz);
00449     } else { /* Only for nonlinear models with correlated random effects */
00450         AZERO(ax, annz);        /* Initialize potential nonzeros to 0 */
00451         for (int j = 0; j < A->ncol; j++) { /* Iterate over columns */
00452             int pa = ap[j];
00453             for (int p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++) { /* nonzeros in Z' */
00454                 while (ai[pa] < zi[p]) pa++;          /* matching pos in A */
00455                 if (ai[pa] != zi[p])
00456                     error(_("nonconforming Zt and A structures, j = %d"), j);
00457                 ax[pa] = zx[p];
00458             }
00459         }
00460     }
00461                                 /* When T != I multiply A on the left by T' */
00462     if (ncmax > 1)              /* T' == I when ncmax == 1 */
00463         for (int j = 0; j < A->ncol; j++) /* multiply column j by T' */
00464             for (int p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1];) {
00465                 int i = Gp_grp(ai[p], nf, Gp);
00466 
00467                 if (nc[i] <= 1) p++;
00468                 else {
00469                     int nr = p; /* number of rows in `B' in dtrmm call */
00470                     while ((ai[nr] - Gp[i]) < nlev[i]) nr++;
00471                     nr -= p;    /* nr == 1 except in models with carry-over */
00472                     F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "N", "U", &nr, nc + i,
00473                                     one, st[i], nc + i, ax + p, &nr);
00474                     p += (nr * nc[i]);
00475                 }
00476             }
00477                                 /* Multiply A on the left by S */
00478     for (int p = 0; p < annz; p++) {
00479         int i = Gp_grp(ai[p], nf, Gp);
00480         ax[p] *= st[i][((ai[p] - Gp[i]) / nlev[i]) * (nc[i] + 1)];
00481     }
00482 }
00483 
00491 static void
00492 ST_setPars(SEXP x, const double *pars)
00493 {
00494     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), ncmax, nf = DIMS_SLOT(x)[nf_POS], pos = 0;
00495     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00496     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00497     R_CheckStack();
00498 
00499     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00500                                 /* install the parameters in the ST slot */
00501     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00502         int nci = nc[i], ncp1 = nc[i] + 1;
00503         double *sti = st[i];
00504 
00505         for (int j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00506             sti[j * ncp1] = pars[pos++];
00507         for (int j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00508             for (int k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00509                 sti[k + j * nci] = pars[pos++];
00510     }
00511     update_A(x);
00512 }

00527     if (!isReal(pars) || LENGTH(pars) != npar)
00528         error(_("pars must be a real vector of length %d"), npar);
00529     ST_setPars(x, REAL(pars));
00530     return R_NilValue;

00552 
00560 SEXP mer_postVar(SEXP x)
00561 {
00562     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
00563     int nf = dims[nf_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00564     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, nf));
00565     double *vv, one[] = {1,0}, sc;
00566     CHM_SP sm1, sm2;
00567     CHM_DN dm1;
00568     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00569     int *Perm = (int*)(L->Perm), *iperm = Alloca(q, int),
00570         *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00571     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00572     R_CheckStack();
00573 
00574     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00575     for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) iperm[Perm[j]] = j; /* inverse permutation */
00576     sc = dims[useSc_POS] ?
00577         (DEV_SLOT(x)[dims[isREML_POS] ? sigmaREML_POS : sigmaML_POS]) : 1;
00578     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00579         int ncisqr = nc[i] * nc[i];
00580         CHM_SP rhs = M_cholmod_allocate_sparse(q, nc[i], nc[i],
00581                                                1/*sorted*/, 1/*packed*/,
00582                                                0/*stype*/, CHOLMOD_REAL, &c);
00583 
00584         SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, i, alloc3DArray(REALSXP, nc[i], nc[i], nlev[i]));
00585         vv = REAL(VECTOR_ELT(ans, i));
00586         for (int j = 0; j <= nc[i]; j++) ((int *)(rhs->p))[j] = j;
00587         for (int j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
00588             ((double *)(rhs->x))[j] = st[i][j * (nc[i] + 1)] * sc;
00589         for (int k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++) {
00590             double *vvk = vv + k * ncisqr;
00591             for (int j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
00592                 ((int*)(rhs->i))[j] = iperm[Gp[i] + k + j * nlev[i]];
00593             sm1 = M_cholmod_spsolve(CHOLMOD_L, L, rhs, &c);
00594             sm2 = M_cholmod_transpose(sm1, 1 /*values*/, &c);
00595             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c);
00596             sm1 = M_cholmod_aat(sm2, (int*)NULL, (size_t)0, 1 /*mode*/, &c);
00597             dm1 = M_cholmod_sparse_to_dense(sm1, &c);
00598             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c); M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm2, &c);
00599             Memcpy(vvk, (double*)(dm1->x), ncisqr);
00600             M_cholmod_free_dense(&dm1, &c);
00601             if (nc[i] > 1) {
00602                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("L", "L", "N", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
00603                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
00604                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
00605                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
00606             }
00607         }
00608         M_cholmod_free_sparse(&rhs, &c);
00609     }
00610     UNPROTECT(1);
00611     return ans;
00612 }
00613 
00622 SEXP mer_create_L(SEXP CmP)
00623 {
00624     double one[] = {1, 0};
00625     CHM_SP Cm = AS_CHM_SP(CmP);
00626     CHM_FR L;
00627     R_CheckStack();
00628 
00629     L = M_cholmod_analyze(Cm, &c);
00630     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(Cm, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00631         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00632               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00633 
00634     return M_chm_factor_to_SEXP(L, 1);
00635 }
00636 
00637 
00638 /* Utilities and constants for generalized linear models */
00639 
00640 static const double LTHRESH = 30.;
00641 static const double MLTHRESH = -30.;
00642 static double MPTHRESH = 0;
00643 static double PTHRESH = 0;
00644 static const double INVEPS = 1/DOUBLE_EPS;
00645 
00658 static void
00659 lme4_muEta(double* mu, double* muEta, const double* eta, int n, int lTyp)
00660 {
00661     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) { /* apply the generalized linear part */
00662         double etai = eta[i], tmp;
00663         switch(lTyp) {
00664         case 1:         /* logit */
00665             tmp = (etai < MLTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00666             ((etai > LTHRESH) ? INVEPS : exp(etai));
00667             mu[i] = tmp/(1 + tmp);
00668             muEta[i] = mu[i] * (1 - mu[i]);
00669             break;
00670         case 2:         /* probit */
00671             if (!MPTHRESH) {
00672                 MPTHRESH = qnorm5(DOUBLE_EPS, 0, 1, 1, 0);
00673                 PTHRESH = -MPTHRESH;
00674             }
00675             mu[i] = (etai < MPTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00676                 ((etai > PTHRESH) ? 1 - DOUBLE_EPS :
00677                  pnorm5(etai, 0, 1, 1, 0));
00678             tmp = dnorm4(eta[i], 0, 1, 0);
00679             muEta[i] = (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00680             break;
00681         case 3:         /* cauchit */
00682             error(_("cauchit link not yet coded"));
00683             break;
00684         case 4:         /* cloglog */
00685             error(_("cloglog link not yet coded"));
00686             break;
00687         case 5:         /* identity */
00688             mu[i] = eta[i];
00689             muEta[i] = 1.;
00690             break;
00691         case 6:         /* log */
00692             tmp = exp(eta[i]);
00693             muEta[i] = mu[i] =
00694                 (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00695             break;
00696         case 7:         /* sqrt */
00697             mu[i] = etai * etai;
00698             muEta[i] = 2 * etai;
00699             break;
00700         default:
00701             error(_("General form of glmer_linkinv not yet written"));
00702         }
00703     }
00704 }
00705 
00716 static void
00717 lme4_varFunc(double* var, const double* mu, int n, int vTyp)
00718 {
00719     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00720         double mui = mu[i];
00721         switch(vTyp) {
00722         case 1:                 /* constant variance */
00723             var[i] = 1.;
00724             break;
00725         case 2:                 /* mu(1-mu) variance */
00726             if (mui <= 0 || mui >= 1)
00727                 error(_("mu[i] must be in the range (0,1): mu = %g, i = %d"),
00728                       mu, i);
00729             var[i] = mui * (1 - mui);
00730             break;
00731         case 3:                 /* mu variance */
00732             if (mui <= 0)
00733                 error(_("mu[i] must be positive: mu = %g, i = %d"), mu, i);
00734             var[i] = mui;
00735             break;
00736         case 4:                 /* mu^2 variance */
00737             if (mui <= 0)
00738                 error(_("mu[i] must be positive: mu = %g, i = %d"), mu, i);
00739             var[i] = mui * mui;
00740             break;
00741         case 5:                 /* mu^3 variance */
00742             if (mui <= 0)
00743                 error(_("mu[i] must be positive: mu = %g, i = %d"), mu, i);
00744             var[i] = mui * mui * mui;
00745             break;
00746         default:
00747             error(_("Unknown vTyp value %d"), vTyp);
00748         }
00749     }
00750 }
00751 
00760 static R_INLINE double y_log_y(double y, double mu)
00761 {
00762     return (y) ? (y * log(y/mu)) : 0;
00763 }
00764 
00778 static double
00779 lme4_devResid(const double* mu, const double* pWt, const double* y,
00780               int n, int vTyp)
00781 {
00782     double ans = 0.;
00783     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00784         double mui = mu[i], wi = pWt ? pWt[i] : 1, yi = y[i];
00785         double ri = yi - mui;
00786         switch(vTyp) {
00787         case 1:                 /* constant variance */
00788             ans += wi * ri * ri;
00789             break;
00790         case 2:                 /* mu(1-mu) variance */
00791             ans += 2 * wi *
00792                 (y_log_y(yi, mui) + y_log_y(1 - yi, 1 - mui));
00793             break;
00794         case 3:                 /* mu variance */
00795             ans += 2 * wi * (y_log_y(yi, mui) - (yi - mui));
00796             break;
00797         case 4:                 /* mu^2 variance */
00798             ans += 2 * wi * (y_log_y(yi, mui) - (yi - mui)/mui);
00799             break;
00800         case 5:                 /* mu^3 variance */
00801             ans += wi * (ri * ri)/(yi * mui * mui);
00802             break;
00803         default:
00804             error(_("Unknown vTyp value %d"), vTyp);
00805         }
00806     }
00807     return ans;
00808 }
00809 
00819 static double update_mu(SEXP x)
00820 {
00821     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
00822     int i1 = 1, n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
00823     int ns = n * s;
00824     double *V = V_SLOT(x), *d = DEV_SLOT(x), *eta = ETA_SLOT(x),
00825         *etaold = (double*) NULL, *mu = MU_SLOT(x),
00826         *muEta = MUETA_SLOT(x), *offset = OFFSET_SLOT(x),
00827         *srwt = SRWT_SLOT(x), *res = RESID_SLOT(x),
00828         *var = VAR_SLOT(x), *y = Y_SLOT(x), one[] = {1,0};
00829     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00830     CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x);
00831     CHM_DN Ptu, ceta, cu = AS_CHM_DN(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uSym));
00832     R_CheckStack();
00833 
00834     if (V) {
00835         etaold = eta;
00836         eta = Calloc(ns, double);
00837     }
00838                                 /* eta := offset or eta := 0 */
00839     for (int i = 0; i < ns; i++) eta[i] = offset ? offset[i] : 0;
00840                                 /* eta := eta + X \beta */
00841     F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &ns, &p, one, X_SLOT(x), &ns,
00842                     FIXEF_SLOT(x), &i1, one, eta, &i1);
00843                                 /* eta := eta + C' P' u */
00844     Ptu = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Pt, L, cu, &c);
00845     ceta = N_AS_CHM_DN(eta, ns, 1);
00846     R_CheckStack();
00847     if (!M_cholmod_sdmult(A, 1 /* trans */, one, one, Ptu, ceta, &c))
00848         error(_("cholmod_sdmult error returned"));
00849     M_cholmod_free_dense(&Ptu, &c);
00850 
00851     if (V) {            /* evaluate the nonlinear model */
00852         SEXP pnames = VECTOR_ELT(GET_DIMNAMES(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_VSym)), 1),
00853             gg, rho = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_envSym), vv;
00854         int *gdims;
00855         
00856         if (!isString(pnames) || LENGTH(pnames) != s)
00857             error(_("Slot V must be a matrix with %d named columns"), s);
00858         for (int i = 0; i < s; i++) { /* par. vals. into env. */
00859             vv = findVarInFrame(rho,
00860                                 install(CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i))));
00861             if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00862                 error(_("Parameter %s in the environment must be a length %d numeric vector"),
00863                       CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i)), n);
00864             Memcpy(REAL(vv), eta + i * n, n);
00865         }
00866         vv = PROTECT(eval(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_nlmodelSym), rho));
00867         if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00868             error(_("evaluated model is not a numeric vector of length %d"), n);
00869         gg = getAttrib(vv, lme4_gradientSym);
00870         if (!isReal(gg) || !isMatrix(gg))
00871             error(_("gradient attribute of evaluated model must be a numeric matrix"));
00872         gdims = INTEGER(getAttrib(gg, R_DimSymbol));
00873         if (gdims[0] != n ||gdims[1] != s)
00874             error(_("gradient matrix must be of size %d by %d"), n, s);
00875                                 /* colnames of the gradient
00876                                  * corresponding to the order of the
00877                                  * pnames has been checked */
00878         Free(eta);
00879         eta = etaold;
00880         Memcpy(eta, REAL(vv), n);
00881         Memcpy(V, REAL(gg), ns);
00882         UNPROTECT(1);
00883     }
00884 
00885     if (muEta) {
00886         lme4_muEta(mu, muEta, eta, n, dims[lTyp_POS]);
00887         lme4_varFunc(var, mu, n, dims[vTyp_POS]);
00888     } else {
00889         Memcpy(mu, eta, n);
00890     }
00891 
00892     d[wrss_POS] = 0;            /* update resid slot and d[wrss_POS] */
00893     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00894         res[i] = (y[i] - mu[i]) * (srwt ? srwt[i] : 1);
00895         d[wrss_POS] += res[i] * res[i];
00896     }
00897                                 /* store u'u */
00898     d[usqr_POS] = sqr_length((double*)(cu->x), dims[q_POS]);
00899     d[pwrss_POS] = d[usqr_POS] + d[wrss_POS];
00900     d[sigmaML_POS] = sqrt(d[pwrss_POS]/
00901                           (srwt ? sqr_length(srwt, n) : (double) n));
00902     d[sigmaREML_POS] = (V || muEta) ? NA_REAL :
00903         d[sigmaML_POS] * sqrt((((double) n)/((double)(n - p))));
00904     return d[pwrss_POS];
00905 }
00906 
00917 SEXP mer_update_mu(SEXP x)
00918 {
00919     return ScalarReal(update_mu(x));
00920 }
00921 
00932 static double update_L(SEXP x)
00933 {
00934     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
00935     int n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
00936     double *V = V_SLOT(x), *cx = Cx_SLOT(x), *d = DEV_SLOT(x),
00937         *res = RESID_SLOT(x), *mu = MU_SLOT(x), *muEta = MUETA_SLOT(x),
00938         *pwt = PWT_SLOT(x), *sXwt = SXWT_SLOT(x), *srwt = SRWT_SLOT(x),
00939         *var =  VAR_SLOT(x), *y = Y_SLOT(x), one[] = {1,0};
00940     CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x);
00941     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00942     R_CheckStack();
00943     
00944     if (var || pwt) {      /* Update srwt and res. Reevaluate wrss. */
00945         d[wrss_POS] = 0;
00946         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00947             srwt[j] = sqrt((pwt ? pwt[j] : 1.0) / (var ? var[j] : 1.0));
00948             res[j] = srwt[j] * (y[j] - mu[j]);
00949             d[wrss_POS] += res[j] * res[j];
00950         }
00951     }
00952     if (sXwt) {                 /* Update sXwt and C */
00953         int *ai = (int*)A->i, *ap = (int*)A->p;
00954         double *ax = (double*)(A->x);
00955         CHM_SP C = A;
00956 
00957         for (int j = 0; j < s; j++) {
00958             for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00959                 int ja = i + j * n;
00960                 sXwt[ja] = (srwt ? srwt[i] : 1) *
00961                     (muEta ? muEta[i] : 1) * (V ? V[ja] : 1);
00962             }
00963         }
00964         if (cx) {               /* C is a scaled version of A */
00965             for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)
00966                 for (int p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
00967                     cx[p] = ax[p] * sXwt[j];
00968             A->x = (void*)cx;
00969         } else {
00970             int *ci, *cp;
00971             C = Cm_SLOT(x);
00972             R_CheckStack();
00973 
00974             ci = (int*)C->i; cp = (int*)C->p; cx = (double*)C->x;
00975             AZERO(cx, cp[n]);
00976             for (int j = 0; j < s; j++)
00977                 for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00978                     int ja = i + j * n, pc;
00979                     for (int pa = ap[ja]; pa < ap[ja + 1]; pa++) {
00980                         for (pc = cp[i]; pc < cp[i + 1]; pc++)
00981                             if (ci[pc] == ai[pa]) break;
00982                         if (pc >= cp[i + 1])
00983                             error(_("Structure of Cm and A are not consistent"));
00984                         cx[pc] += ax[pa] * sXwt[ja];
00985                     }
00986                 }
00987             A = C;
00988         }
00989     }
00990     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(A, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00991         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00992               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00993 
00994     d[ldL2_POS] = 0;            /* evaluate log(det(L))^2 */
00995     if (L->is_super) {
00996         for (int i = 0; i < L->nsuper; i++) {
00997             int nrp1 = 1 + ((int *)(L->pi))[i + 1] - ((int *)(L->pi))[i],
00998                 nc = ((int *)(L->super))[i + 1] - ((int *)(L->super))[i];
00999             double *x = (double *)(L->x) + ((int *)(L->px))[i];
01000 
01001             for (int j = 0; j < nc; j++) {
01002                 d[ldL2_POS] += 2 * log(fabs(x[j * nrp1]));
01003             }
01004         }
01005     } else {
01006         int *li = (int*)(L->i), *lp = (int*)(L->p);
01007         double *lx = (double *)(L->x);
01008         
01009         for (int j = 0; j < L->n; j++) {
01010             int p;
01011             for (p = lp[j]; li[p] != j && p < lp[j + 1]; p++) {};
01012             if (li[p] != j) break; /* what happened to the diagonal element? */
01013             d[ldL2_POS] += log(lx[p] * ((L->is_ll) ? lx[p] : 1.));
01014         }
01015     }
01016     d[pwrss_POS] = d[usqr_POS] + d[wrss_POS];
01017     d[sigmaML_POS] = sqrt(d[pwrss_POS]/
01018                           (srwt ? sqr_length(srwt, n) : (double) n));
01019     d[sigmaREML_POS] = (V || muEta) ? NA_REAL :
01020         d[sigmaML_POS] * sqrt((((double) n)/((double)(n - p))));
01021     return d[pwrss_POS];
01022 }
01023 
01035 SEXP mer_update_L(SEXP x)
01036 {
01037     return ScalarReal(update_L(x));
01038 }
01039 
01041 #define CM_MAXITER  300
01042 
01043 #define CM_TOL      1e-10
01044 
01045 #define CM_SMIN     1e-5
01046 
01056 static int update_u(SEXP x, int verb)
01057 {
01058     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01059     int i, n = dims[n_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
01060     double *Cx = Cx_SLOT(x), *sXwt = SXWT_SLOT(x),
01061         *res = RESID_SLOT(x), *u = U_SLOT(x),
01062         cfac = ((double)n) / ((double)q), 
01063         crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, step;
01064     double *tmp = Alloca(q, double), *tmp1 = Alloca(q, double),
01065         *uold = Alloca(q, double), one[] = {1,0}, zero[] = {0,0};
01066     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01067     CHM_DN cres = N_AS_CHM_DN(res, n, 1),
01068         ctmp = N_AS_CHM_DN(tmp, q, 1), sol;
01069     CHM_SP C = Cm_SLOT(x);
01070     R_CheckStack();
01071     
01072     if (!sXwt) return(0);       /* nothing to do for LMMs */
01073     if (!(L->is_ll)) error(_("L must be LL', not LDL'"));
01074     if (q > n) error(_("q = %d > n = %d"), q, n);
01075     if (Cx) {               /* A and C have the same structure */
01076         C = A_SLOT(x);
01077         R_CheckStack();
01078         C->x = (void*)Cx;
01079     }
01080     
01081     /* resetting u to zero at the beginning of each evaluation
01082      * requires more iterations but is necessary to obtain a
01083      * repeatable evaluation.  If this is not done the optimization
01084      * algorithm can take wild steps. */
01085     AZERO(u, q);
01086     update_mu(x);
01087     for (i = 0; ; i++) {
01088         
01089         Memcpy(uold, u, q);
01090         pwrss_old = update_L(x);
01091                                 /* tmp := PC %*% wtdResid */
01092         M_cholmod_sdmult(C, 0 /* notrans */, one, zero, cres, ctmp, &c);
01093         Memcpy(tmp1, tmp, q);
01094         apply_perm(tmp, tmp1, (int*)L->Perm, q);
01095                                 /* tmp := tmp - u */
01096         for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) tmp[j] -= u[j];
01097                                 /* solve L %*% sol = tmp */
01098         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, ctmp, &c)))
01099             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_L) failed"));
01100         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
01101         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01102                                 /* evaluate convergence criterion */
01103         crit = cfac * sqr_length(tmp, q) / pwrss_old;
01104         if (crit < CM_TOL) break; /* don't do needless evaluations */
01105                                 /* solve t(L) %*% sol = tmp */
01106         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, ctmp, &c)))
01107             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed"));
01108         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
01109         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01110 
01111         for (step = 1; step > CM_SMIN; step /= 2) { /* step halving */
01112             for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) u[j] = uold[j] + step * tmp[j];
01113             pwrss = update_mu(x);
01114             if (verb < 0)
01115                 Rprintf("%2d,%8.6f,%12.4g: %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g\n",
01116                         i, step, crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, u[1], u[2]);
01117             if (pwrss < pwrss_old) {
01118                 pwrss_old = pwrss;
01119                 break;
01120             }
01121         }
01122         if (step <= CM_SMIN || i > CM_MAXITER) return 0;
01123     }
01124     return i;
01125 }
01126 
01138 SEXP mer_update_u(SEXP x, SEXP verbP)
01139 {
01140     return ScalarInteger(update_u(x, asInteger(verbP)));
01141 }
01142 
01143 /* FIXME: change this to use the variance type slot.  If
01144  * dims[useSc_POS] is nonzero then use the formula for the profiled
01145  * deviance.  (Does everything work out nicely if sigma is identically
01146  * 1 when useSc is false?)
01147  */
01148 
01156 SEXP mer_update_dev(SEXP x)
01157 {
01158     double *d = DEV_SLOT(x);
01159     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01160 
01161     d[disc_POS] = MUETA_SLOT(x) ?
01162         lme4_devResid(MU_SLOT(x), PWT_SLOT(x), Y_SLOT(x),
01163                       dims[n_POS], dims[vTyp_POS]) :
01164         d[wrss_POS];
01165     d[ML_POS] = d[disc_POS] + d[ldL2_POS] + d[usqr_POS];
01166     return R_NilValue;
01167 }
01168 
01179 SEXP mer_update_ranef(SEXP x)
01180 {
01181     update_ranef(x);
01182     return R_NilValue;
01183 }
01184 
01195 static void
01196 P_sdmult(double *dest, const int *perm, const CHM_SP A,
01197          const double *X, int nc)
01198 {
01199     int *ai = (int*)(A->i), *ap = (int*)(A->p), m = A->nrow, n = A->ncol;
01200     double *ax = (double*)(A->x), *tmp = Alloca(m, double);
01201     R_CheckStack();
01202 
01203     for (int k = 0; k < nc; k++) {
01204         AZERO(tmp, m);
01205         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01206             for (int p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
01207                 tmp[ai[p]] += X[j + k * n] * ax[p];
01208         }
01209         apply_perm(dest + k * m, tmp, perm, m);
01210     }
01211 }
01212         
01221 static double update_RX(SEXP x)
01222 {
01223     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), i1 = 1, info;
01224     int n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
01225     double *WX = (double*) NULL, *X = X_SLOT(x), *cx = Cx_SLOT(x),
01226         *d = DEV_SLOT(x), *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x), *RZX = RZX_SLOT(x),
01227         *RX = RX_SLOT(x), *sXwt = SXWT_SLOT(x), *srwt = SRWT_SLOT(x),
01228         *u = U_SLOT(x), *wy = (double*)NULL, *y = Y_SLOT(x),
01229         dn = (double) n, dnmp = (double) (n - p), mone[] = {-1,0},
01230         one[] = {1,0}, zero[] = {0,0};
01231     CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x);
01232     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01233     CHM_DN cRZX = N_AS_CHM_DN(RZX, q, p), ans, cu = N_AS_CHM_DN(u, q, 1);
01234     R_CheckStack();
01235 
01236     if (sXwt) {                 /* Create W^{1/2}GHX in WX */
01237         WX = Calloc(n * p, double);
01238 
01239         AZERO(WX, n * p);
01240         for (int j = 0; j < p; j++)
01241             for (int k = 0; k < s; k++)
01242                 for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
01243                     WX[i + j * n] +=
01244                         sXwt[i + k * n] * X[i + n * (k + j * s)];
01245         X = WX;
01246         /* Replace A by C, either just the x component or the entire matrix */
01247         if (cx) A->x = (void*)cx;
01248         else {
01249             A = Cm_SLOT(x);
01250             R_CheckStack();
01251         }
01252     }
01253                                 /* solve L %*% RZX = PAW^{1/2}GHX */
01254     P_sdmult(RZX, (int*)L->Perm, A, X, p); /* right-hand side */
01255     ans = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, cRZX, &c); /* solution */
01256     Memcpy(RZX, (double*)(ans->x), q * p);
01257     M_cholmod_free_dense(&ans, &c);
01258                                 /* downdate X'X and factor  */
01259     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &p, &n, one, X, &n, zero, RX, &p); /* X'X */
01260     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &p, &q, mone, RZX, &q, one, RX, &p);
01261     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &p, RX, &p, &info);
01262     if (info)
01263         error(_("Downdated X'X is not positive definite, %d."), info);
01264                                 /* accumulate log(det(RX)^2)  */
01265     d[ldRX2_POS] = 0;
01266     for (int j = 0; j < p; j++) d[ldRX2_POS] += 2 * log(RX[j * (p + 1)]);
01267 
01268     if (V_SLOT(x) || MUETA_SLOT(x)) { /* nonlinear or generalized */
01269         if (WX) Free(WX);
01270         return d[ML_POS];
01271     }
01272                                 /* linear mixed models only */
01273     cu = N_AS_CHM_DN(u, q, 1);
01274     R_CheckStack();
01275                                 /* solve L del1 = PAy */
01276     if (sXwt) {
01277         wy = Calloc(n, double);
01278         for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) wy[i] = sXwt[i] * y[i];
01279         y = wy;
01280     }
01281     P_sdmult(u, (int*)L->Perm, A, y, 1);
01282     ans = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, cu, &c);
01283     Memcpy(u, (double*)ans->x, q);
01284     M_cholmod_free_dense(&ans, &c);
01285                                 /* solve RX' del2 = X'y - RZX'del1 */
01286     F77_CALL(dgemv)("T", &n, &p, one, X, &n, y, &i1, zero, fixef, &i1);
01287     F77_CALL(dgemv)("T", &q, &p, mone, RZX, &q,
01288                     u, &i1, one, fixef, &i1);
01289     F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "T", "N", &p, RX, &p, fixef, &i1);
01290     d[pwrss_POS] = sqr_length(y, n)
01291         - (sqr_length(fixef, p) + sqr_length(u, q));
01292     if (d[pwrss_POS] < 0)
01293         error(_("Calculated PWRSS for a LMM is negative"));
01294     d[ML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] +
01295         dn * (1 + log(d[pwrss_POS]) + log(2 * PI / dn));
01296     d[REML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] + d[ldRX2_POS] +
01297         dnmp * (1. + log(d[pwrss_POS]) + log(2. * PI / dnmp));
01298     d[sigmaML_POS] = sqrt(d[pwrss_POS]/
01299                           (srwt ? sqr_length(srwt, n) : (double) n));
01300     d[sigmaREML_POS] = d[sigmaML_POS] * sqrt((((double) n)/((double)(n - p))));
01301 
01302     if (wy) Free(wy);
01303     if (WX) Free(WX);
01304     return d[dims[isREML_POS] ? REML_POS : ML_POS];
01305 }
01306 
01314 SEXP
01315 mer_update_RX(SEXP x)
01316 {
01317     return ScalarReal(update_RX(x));
01318 }
01319 
01329 SEXP 
01330 mer_optimize(SEXP x, SEXP verbp)
01331 {
01332     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
01333     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), verb = asInteger(verbp);
01334     int lmm = !(MUETA_SLOT(x) || V_SLOT(x)), nf = dims[nf_POS];
01335 /* FIXME: need to add 1 to nv for GLMM with a scale par (maybe).
01336  * Not really but we do need to profile out the scale parameter when
01337  * useSc is TRUE. */
01338     int nv = dims[np_POS] + (lmm ? 0 : dims[p_POS]);
01339     int liv = S_iv_length(OPT, nv), lv = S_v_length(OPT, nv);
01340     double *g = (double*)NULL, *h = (double*)NULL, fx = R_PosInf;
01341     double *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x);
01342     int *iv = Alloca(liv, int);
01343     double *b = Alloca(2 * nv, double), *d = Alloca(nv, double),
01344         *v = Alloca(lv, double), *xv = Alloca(nv, double);
01345     R_CheckStack();
01346 
01347     ST_getPars(x, xv);
01348     if (!lmm) {
01349         double eta = 1.e-5; /* estimated rel. error on computed lpdisc */
01350 
01351         Memcpy(xv + dims[np_POS], fixef, dims[p_POS]);
01352         v[31] = eta;            /* RFCTOL */
01353         v[36] = eta;            /* SCTOL */
01354         v[41] = eta;            /* ETA0 */
01355     }
01356                                 /* initialize the state vectors v and iv */
01357     S_Rf_divset(OPT, iv, liv, lv, v);
01358     if (verb) iv[OUTLEV] = 1;
01359                                 /* set the bounds to plus/minus Infty  */
01360     for (int i = 0; i < nv; i++) {
01361         b[2*i] = R_NegInf; b[2*i+1] = R_PosInf; d[i] = 1;
01362     }
01363                                 /* reset lower bounds on elements of theta_S */
01364     for (int i = 0, pos = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01365         int nc = *INTEGER(getAttrib(VECTOR_ELT(ST, i), R_DimSymbol));
01366         for (int j = 0; j < nc; j++) b[pos + 2*j] = 0;
01367         pos += nc * (nc + 1);
01368     }
01369     do {
01370         ST_setPars(x, xv);              /* update ST and C */
01371 /* FIXME: Change this so that update_dev is always called and that
01372  * function does the selection of methods based on lmm. The Memcpy
01373  * call should always be used but the number of values to copy can be
01374  * zero. */
01375         if (lmm) {
01376             update_L(x);
01377             fx = update_RX(x);
01378         } else {
01379             
01380             Memcpy(fixef, xv + dims[np_POS], dims[p_POS]);
01381             update_u(x, verb);
01382             mer_update_dev(x);
01383             fx = DEV_SLOT(x)[ML_POS];
01384         }
01385         S_nlminb_iterate(b, d, fx, g, h, iv, liv, lv, nv, v, xv);
01386     } while (iv[0] == 1 || iv[0] == 2);
01387     update_RX(x);
01388     dims[cvg_POS] = iv[0];
01389     return R_NilValue;
01390 }
01391 
01392 /* Functions for sampling from a Wishart distribution */
01393 /* FIXME: Move these to the R sources */
01394 
01407 static double
01408 *std_rWishart_factor(double nu, int p, int upper, double ans[])
01409 {
01410     int pp1 = p + 1;
01411 
01412     if (nu < (double) p || p <= 0)
01413         error("inconsistent degrees of freedom and dimension");
01414 
01415     AZERO(ans, p * p);
01416     for (int j = 0; j < p; j++) {       /* jth column */
01417         ans[j * pp1] = sqrt(rchisq(nu - (double) j));
01418         for (int i = 0; i < j; i++) {
01419             int uind = i + j * p, /* upper triangle index */
01420                 lind = j + i * p; /* lower triangle index */
01421             ans[(upper ? uind : lind)] = norm_rand();
01422             ans[(upper ? lind : uind)] = 0;
01423         }
01424     }
01425     return ans;
01426 }
01427 
01437 SEXP
01438 lme4_rWishart(SEXP ns, SEXP nuP, SEXP scal)
01439 {
01440     SEXP ans;
01441     int *dims = INTEGER(getAttrib(scal, R_DimSymbol)), info,
01442         n = asInteger(ns), psqr;
01443     double *scCp, *ansp, *tmp, nu = asReal(nuP), one = 1, zero = 0;
01444 
01445     if (!isMatrix(scal) || !isReal(scal) || dims[0] != dims[1])
01446         error("scal must be a square, real matrix");
01447     if (n <= 0) n = 1;
01448     psqr = dims[0] * dims[0];
01449     tmp = Alloca(psqr, double);
01450     scCp = Alloca(psqr, double);
01451     R_CheckStack();
01452 
01453     Memcpy(scCp, REAL(scal), psqr);
01454     AZERO(tmp, psqr);
01455     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &(dims[0]), scCp, &(dims[0]), &info);
01456     if (info)
01457         error("scal matrix is not positive-definite");
01458     PROTECT(ans = alloc3DArray(REALSXP, dims[0], dims[0], n));
01459     ansp = REAL(ans);
01460     GetRNGstate();
01461     for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01462         double *ansj = ansp + j * psqr;
01463         std_rWishart_factor(nu, dims[0], 1, tmp);
01464         F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "U", "N", "N", dims, dims,
01465                         &one, scCp, dims, tmp, dims);
01466         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &(dims[1]), &(dims[1]),
01467                         &one, tmp, &(dims[1]),
01468                         &zero, ansj, &(dims[1]));
01469 
01470         for (int i = 1; i < dims[0]; i++)
01471             for (int k = 0; k < i; k++)
01472                 ansj[i + k * dims[0]] = ansj[k + i * dims[0]];
01473     }
01474 
01475     PutRNGstate();
01476     UNPROTECT(1);
01477     return ans;
01478 }
01479 
01480 /* MCMC sampling functions */
01481 
01493 static void MCMC_beta_u(SEXP x, double sigma, double *fvals, double *rvals)
01494 {
01495     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01496     int i1 = 1, p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
01497     double *V = V_SLOT(x), *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x), *muEta = MUETA_SLOT(x),
01498         *u = U_SLOT(x), mone[] = {-1,0}, one[] = {1,0};
01499     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01500     double *del1 = Alloca(q, double), *del2 = Alloca(p, double);
01501     CHM_DN sol, rhs = N_AS_CHM_DN(del1, q, 1);
01502     R_CheckStack();
01503 
01504     if (V || muEta) {
01505         error(_("Update not yet written"));
01506     } else {                    /* Linear mixed model */
01507         update_L(x);
01508         update_RX(x);
01509         update_ranef(x);     /* Provides conditional beta-hat and u */
01510                                 /* Update beta */
01511         for (int j = 0; j < p; j++) del2[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01512         F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, RX_SLOT(x), &p, del2, &i1);
01513         for (int j = 0; j < p; j++) fixef[j] += del2[j];
01514                                 /* Update u */
01515         for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) del1[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01516         F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, mone, RZX_SLOT(x), &q,
01517                         del2, &i1, one, del1, &i1);
01518         sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, rhs, &c);
01519         for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) u[j] += ((double*)(sol->x))[j];
01520         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01521         update_mu(x);        /* and parts of the deviance slot */
01522     }
01523     Memcpy(fvals, fixef, p);
01524     if (rvals) {
01525         update_ranef(x);
01526         Memcpy(rvals, RANEF_SLOT(x), q);
01527     }
01528 }
01529 
01539 static void MCMC_ST(SEXP x, double sigma, double *vals)
01540 {
01541     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), *perm = PERM_VEC(x);
01542     int nf = dims[nf_POS], q = dims[q_POS], pos = 0;
01543     double *Ptu = Calloc(q, double), *u = U_SLOT(x);
01544     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
01545     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01546     R_CheckStack();
01547 
01548     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
01549                                 /* inverse permutation of u */
01550     for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) Ptu[perm[j]] = u[j];
01551 
01552     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01553         int qi = nc[i], nl = nlev[i];
01554         double *sti = st[i], *ui = Ptu + Gp[i];
01555 
01556         if (qi == 1) {
01557             *sti *= sqrt(sqr_length(ui, nl)/rchisq((double)nl))/sigma;
01558             vals[pos++] = *sti;
01559         } else {
01560             int info, qisq = qi * qi, qip1 = qi + 1;
01561             double invsigsq = 1/(sigma * sigma), one[] = {1,0}, zer[] = {0,0};
01562 
01563             double *scal = Alloca(qisq, double), *tmp = Alloca(qisq, double);
01564             R_CheckStack();
01565                                 /* scal := crossprod(U_i)/sigma^2 */
01566             F77_CALL(dsyrk)("L", "T", &qi, &nl, &invsigsq, ui, &nl,
01567                             zer, scal, &qi); 
01568             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("L", &qi, scal, &qi, &info);
01569             if (info)
01570                 error(_("scal matrix %d is not positive definite"), i + 1);
01571             /* solve W_i' B_i = R_i for W_i a random std Wishart factor */
01572             F77_CALL(dtrsm)("L", "L", "T", "N", &qi, &qi, one,
01573                             std_rWishart_factor((double)(nl - qi + 1), qi, 0, tmp),
01574                             &qi, scal, &qi);
01575                                 /* B_i := T(theta) %*% S(theta) %*% B_i */
01576             for (int k = 0; k < qi; k++)
01577                 for (int j = 0; j < qi; j++)
01578                     scal[j * qi + k] *= st[i][k * qip1];
01579             F77_CALL(dtrmm)("L", "L", "N", "U", &qi, &qi, one, st[i], &qi, scal, &qi);
01580                                 /* Create the lower Cholesky factor */
01581             F77_CALL(dsyrk)("L", "T", &qi, &qi, one, scal, &qi, zer, tmp, &qi); 
01582             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("L", &qi, tmp, &qi, &info);
01583             if (info)
01584                 error(_("crossproduct matrix %d is not positive definite"), i + 1);
01585                                 /* Update S_i and T_i */
01586             for (int j = 0; j < qi; j++) vals[pos++] = sti[j * qip1] = tmp[j * qip1];
01587             for (int j = 0; j < qi; j++)
01588                 for (int k = j + 1; k < qi; k++)
01589                     vals[pos++] = sti[j * qi + k] = tmp[j * qi + k]/sti[j * qip1];
01590         }
01591     }
01592     update_A(x);
01593     Free(Ptu);
01594 }
01595 
01604 SEXP mer_MCMCsamp(SEXP x, SEXP fm)
01605 {
01606     SEXP devsamp = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym);
01607     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), nsamp = LENGTH(devsamp);
01608     int n = dims[n_POS], np = dims[np_POS],
01609         p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
01610     double
01611         *STsamp = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym)),
01612         *d = DEV_SLOT(fm), *dev = REAL(devsamp),
01613         *sig = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sigmaSym),
01614         *fixsamp = FIXEF_SLOT(x), *resamp = RANEF_SLOT(x);
01615 
01616     GetRNGstate();
01617     /* The first column of storage slots contains the fitted values */
01618     for (int i = 1; i < nsamp; i++) {
01619 /* FIXME: This is probably wrong for a model with weights. */
01620         if (sig)                /* update and store sigma */
01621             sig[i] = sqrt(d[pwrss_POS]/rchisq((double)(n + q)));
01622                                 /* update ST and A */
01623         MCMC_ST(fm, sig ? sig[i] : 1, STsamp + i * np);   
01624                         /* update L, RX, beta, u, eta, mu, res and d */
01625         MCMC_beta_u(fm, sig ? sig[i] : 1, fixsamp + i * p,
01626                     resamp + (resamp ? i : 0) * q); 
01627         dev[i] = d[ML_POS];
01628     }
01629     PutRNGstate();
01630                 /* Restore pars from the first columns of the samples */
01631     ST_setPars(fm, STsamp);
01632     Memcpy(FIXEF_SLOT(fm), fixsamp, p);
01633     update_u(fm, 0);
01634     update_L(fm);
01635     update_RX(fm);
01636     update_ranef(fm);
01637 
01638     return x;
01639 }
01640 
01641 #ifndef BUF_SIZE
01642 
01643 #define BUF_SIZE 127
01644 #endif  
01645 
01659 static int chkDims(char *buf, int nb, SEXP x, SEXP sym, int nr, int nc)
01660 {
01661     SEXP MP = GET_SLOT(x, sym);
01662     int *dm = isMatrix(MP) ? INTEGER(getAttrib(MP, R_DimSymbol)) : (int*) NULL;
01663     if (!dm || !isReal(MP) || dm[0] != nr || dm[1] != nc)
01664         return snprintf(buf, BUF_SIZE,
01665                         _("Slot %s must be a numeric matrix of size %d by %d"),
01666                         CHAR(PRINTNAME(sym)), nr, nc);
01667     return 0;
01668 }
01669 
01682 static int chkLen(char *buf, int nb, SEXP x, SEXP sym, int len, int zerok)
01683 {
01684     int ll;
01685 
01686     if (!(ll = LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, sym))) == len && zerok && !ll)
01687         return snprintf(buf, BUF_SIZE, _("Slot %s must have length %d."),
01688                         CHAR(PRINTNAME(sym)), len);
01689     return 0;
01690 }
01691 
01700 SEXP mer_validate(SEXP x)
01701 {
01702     SEXP GpP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym),
01703         ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
01704         devianceP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym),
01705         dimsP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym),
01706         flistP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_flistSym);
01707     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *dd = INTEGER(dimsP);
01708     int n = dd[n_POS], nf = dd[nf_POS], nq, p = dd[p_POS],
01709         q = dd[q_POS], s = dd[s_POS];
01710     int nv = n * s;
01711     CHM_SP Zt = Zt_SLOT(x), A =  A_SLOT(x);
01712     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01713     char *buf = Alloca(BUF_SIZE + 1, char);
01714     R_CheckStack();
01715                                 /* check lengths */
01716     if (nf < 1 || LENGTH(flistP) != nf || LENGTH(ST) != nf)
01717         return mkString(_("Slots ST, and flist must have length dims['nf']"));
01718     if (LENGTH(GpP) != nf + 1)
01719         return mkString(_("Slot Gp must have length dims['nf'] + 1"));
01720     if (Gp[0] != 0 || Gp[nf] != q)
01721         return mkString(_("Gp[1] != 0 or Gp[dims['nf'] + 1] != dims['q']"));
01722     if (LENGTH(devianceP) != (wrss_POS + 1) ||
01723         LENGTH(getAttrib(devianceP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (wrss_POS + 1))
01724         return mkString(_("deviance slot not named or incorrect length"));
01725     if (LENGTH(dimsP) != (cvg_POS + 1) ||
01726         LENGTH(getAttrib(dimsP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (cvg_POS + 1))
01727         return mkString(_("dims slot not named or incorrect length"));
01728     if (L->n != q || !L->is_ll || !L->is_monotonic)
01729         return mkString(_("Slot L must be a monotonic LL' factorization of size dims['q']"));
01730     if (Zt->nrow != q || Zt->ncol != nv)
01731         return mkString(_("Slot Zt must by dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01732     if (A->nrow != q || A->ncol != nv)
01733         return mkString(_("Slot A must be dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01734     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_etaSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01735     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_fixefSym, p, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01736     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_muEtaSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01737     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_muSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01738     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_offsetSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01739     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_pWtSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01740     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ranefSym, q, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01741     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_residSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01742     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_sqrtrWtSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01743     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_uSym, q, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01744     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_VSym, nv, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01745     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_varSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01746     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ySym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01747     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_XSym, nv, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01748     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_RZXSym, q, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01749     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_RXSym, p, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01750 
01751     nq = 0;
01752     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01753         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i), fli = VECTOR_ELT(flistP, i);
01754         int *dm = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
01755         if (!isMatrix(STi) || !isReal(STi) || dm[0] != dm[1])
01756             return
01757                 mkString(_("Slot ST must be a list of square numeric matrices"));
01758         if (Gp[i] > Gp[i + 1])
01759             return mkString(_("Gp must be non-decreasing"));
01760         if (!isFactor(fli))
01761             return mkString(_("flist must be a list of factors"));
01762         nq += dm[0] * LENGTH(getAttrib(fli, R_LevelsSymbol));
01763     }
01764     if (q != nq)
01765         return mkString(_("q is not sum of columns by levels"));
01766     return ScalarLogical(1);
01767 }
01768 
01777 SEXP merMCMC_validate(SEXP x)
01778 {
01779     SEXP GpP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym),
01780         devianceP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym),
01781         dimsP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym);
01782     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *dd = INTEGER(dimsP);
01783     int nf = dd[nf_POS], np = dd[np_POS], nsamp = LENGTH(devianceP),
01784         p = dd[p_POS], q = dd[q_POS];
01785     char *buf = Alloca(BUF_SIZE + 1, char);
01786     R_CheckStack();
01787                                 /* check lengths */
01788     if (nsamp <= 0)
01789         return mkString(_("number of samples must be positive"));
01790     if (LENGTH(dimsP) != (cvg_POS + 1) ||
01791         LENGTH(getAttrib(dimsP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (cvg_POS + 1))
01792         return mkString(_("dims slot not named or incorrect length"));
01793     if (LENGTH(GpP) != nf + 1)
01794         return mkString(_("Slot Gp must have length dims['nf'] + 1"));
01795     if (Gp[0] != 0 || Gp[nf] != q)
01796         return mkString(_("Gp[1] != 0 or Gp[dims['nf'] + 1] != dims['q']"));
01797 
01798     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ncSym, nf, 0))
01799         return(mkString(buf));
01800     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_sigmaSym, nsamp, !dd[useSc_POS]))
01801         return(mkString(buf));
01802     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_STSym, np, nsamp))
01803         return(mkString(buf));
01804     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_fixefSym, p, nsamp))
01805         return(mkString(buf));
01806     if (LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym)))
01807         if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ranefSym, q, nsamp))
01808             return(mkString(buf));
01809     return ScalarLogical(1);
01810 }
01811 
01820 SEXP spR_update_mu(SEXP x)
01821 {
01822     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01823     int n = dims[n_POS];
01824     double *d = DEV_SLOT(x), *eta = Calloc(n, double), *mu = MU_SLOT(x),
01825         *offset = OFFSET_SLOT(x), *srwt = SRWT_SLOT(x),
01826         *res = RESID_SLOT(x), *y = Y_SLOT(x), one[] = {1,0};
01827     CHM_SP Zt = Zt_SLOT(x);
01828     CHM_DN cbeta = AS_CHM_DN(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)),
01829         ceta = N_AS_CHM_DN(eta, n, 1);
01830     R_CheckStack();
01831     
01832     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) eta[i] = offset ? offset[i] : 0;
01833     if (!M_cholmod_sdmult(Zt, 1 /* trans */, one, one, cbeta, ceta, &c))
01834         error(_("cholmod_sdmult error returned"));
01835     lme4_muEta(mu, MUETA_SLOT(x), eta, n, dims[lTyp_POS]);
01836     lme4_varFunc(VAR_SLOT(x), mu, n, dims[vTyp_POS]);
01837 
01838     d[wrss_POS] = 0;            /* update resid slot and d[wrss_POS] */
01839     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01840         res[i] = (y[i] - mu[i]) * srwt[i];
01841         d[wrss_POS] += res[i] * res[i];
01842     }
01843 
01844     Free(eta);
01845     return R_NilValue;
01846 }
01847 
01848 
01859 SEXP spR_optimize(SEXP x, SEXP verbP)
01860 {
01861     int *zp, m, n, nnz, verb = asInteger(verbP);
01862     double *Zcp, *Ztx, *d = DEV_SLOT(x), *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x),
01863         *mu = MU_SLOT(x), *muEta = MUETA_SLOT(x),
01864         *pWt = PWT_SLOT(x), *res = RESID_SLOT(x),
01865         *srwt = SRWT_SLOT(x), *tmp, *tmp2,
01866         *var = VAR_SLOT(x), *y = Y_SLOT(x), cfac, crit,
01867         one[] = {1, 0}, step, wrss_old, zero[] = {0, 0};
01868     CHM_SP Zt = Zt_SLOT(x);
01869     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01870     CHM_DN cres = N_AS_CHM_DN(res, Zt->ncol, 1), ctmp, sol;
01871     R_CheckStack();
01872     
01873     zp = (int*)Zt->p;
01874     m = Zt->nrow;
01875     n = Zt->ncol;
01876     nnz = zp[n];
01877     Zcp = Calloc(nnz, double);
01878     Ztx = (double*)Zt->x;
01879     tmp = Calloc(m, double);
01880     tmp2 = Calloc(m, double);
01881     ctmp = N_AS_CHM_DN(tmp, m, 1);
01882     cfac = ((double)n) / ((double)m);
01883     R_CheckStack();
01884 
01885     spR_update_mu(x);
01886     for (int i = 0; ; i++) {
01887         d[wrss_POS] = 0;
01888         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01889             srwt[j] = sqrt((pWt ? pWt[j] : 1) / var[j]);
01890             res[j] = srwt[j] * (y[j] - mu[j]);
01891             d[wrss_POS] += res[j] * res[j];
01892             for (int p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++)
01893                 Zcp[p] = srwt[j] * muEta[j] * Ztx[p];
01894         }
01895         Zt->x = (void*)Zcp;
01896         if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(Zt, zero, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
01897             error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
01898                   c.status, L->minor, L->n);
01899         wrss_old = d[wrss_POS];
01900                                 /* tmp := Zt %*% muEta %*% var %*% wtdResid */
01901         M_cholmod_sdmult(Zt, 0 /* notrans */, one, zero, cres, ctmp, &c);
01902         Memcpy(tmp2, tmp, m);
01903         apply_perm(tmp, tmp2, (int*)L->Perm, m);
01904                                 /* solve L %*% sol = tmp */
01905         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, ctmp, &c)))
01906             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_L) failed"));
01907         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), m);
01908         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01909                                 /* evaluate convergence criterion */
01910         crit = cfac * sqr_length(tmp, m) / wrss_old;
01911         if (crit < CM_TOL) break; /* don't do needless evaluations */
01912                                 /* solve t(L) %*% sol = tmp */
01913         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, ctmp, &c)))
01914             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed"));
01915         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), m);
01916         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01917 
01918         Memcpy(tmp2, fixef, m);
01919         for (step = 1; step > CM_SMIN; step /= 2) { /* step halving */
01920             for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) fixef[j] = tmp2[j] + step * tmp[j];
01921             spR_update_mu(x);
01922             if (verb < 0)
01923                 Rprintf("%2d,%8.6f,%12.4g: %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g\n",
01924                         i, step, crit, d[wrss_POS], wrss_old, fixef[1], fixef[2]);
01925             if (d[wrss_POS] < wrss_old) {
01926                 wrss_old = d[wrss_POS];
01927                 break;
01928             }
01929         }
01930         if (step <= CM_SMIN || i > CM_MAXITER) return 0;
01931     }
01932     Free(tmp2);
01933     Free(Zcp);
01934     Free(tmp);
01935     return R_NilValue;
01936 }

01990 
01991 static void
01992 safe_pd_matrix(double x[], const char uplo[], int n, double thresh)
01993 {
01994     int info, lwork = 3 * n, nm1 = n - 1;
01995     double *work = Alloca(3 * n, double),
01996         *w = Alloca(n, double),
01997         *xcp = Memcpy(Alloca(n * n, double), x, n * n);
01998 
01999     F77_CALL(dsyev)("N", uplo, &n, xcp, &n, w, work, &lwork, &info);
02000     if (info) error(_("dsyev returned %d"), info);
02001     if (w[nm1] <= 0) error(_("no positive eigenvalues!"));
02002     if ((w[0]/w[nm1]) < thresh) {
02003         int i, np1 = n + 1;
02004         double incr = w[nm1] * thresh;
02005         for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) x[i * np1] += incr;
02006     }
02007 }
